content:
# MUSONI CUSTOMER INTELLIGENCE

Retrieved: 2025-12-03
Category: CUSTOMER INTELLIGENCE
Total Sources: 20+

---

## DOCUMENT 1: REAL PEOPLE KENYA

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/realpeoplekenya/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Kenya
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Real People Kenya Ltd has chosen Musoni as their core banking and digitalisation partner.

**About Real People:**
- Non-deposit taking financial solutions provider for businesses in Kenya
- Target market: SMEs
- Launched in Kenya in 2006
- Seven branches across the country

**Decision Factors:**
In 2021, Real People started to explore upgrading their existing system with a focus on:
- Scaling up operations
- Launching new digital channels for customers
- Musoni's experience in helping organisations digitalise
- Existing integrations with Digital Field Application
- Mobile banking app for end customers

**CEO Quote:**
Robert Shibutse: "We are pleased to have partnered with Musoni Services for our core banking system. Moving our operations to the cloud will result in increased efficiency and enhanced agility to scale up."

**Market Context:**
Musoni is now used by 11 financial organisations across Kenya with a full support & implementation team based in Nairobi.

---

## DOCUMENT 2: TUGENDE (UGANDA & KENYA)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/case_studies/tugende/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - East Africa
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Tugende (name means "Let's Go!" in Luganda) supports motorcycle taxi drivers (boda-bodas) and other SMEs with asset finance.

**Services:**
- Asset finance for motorcycle taxis
- Insurance
- Training
- Goal: Drivers can own motorcycles in 24 months or less

**Musoni Relationship:**
- Started using Musoni in 2013 in Uganda
- Manages over 20,000 active clients through the platform
- Expanded to Kenya in 2019
- Again selected Musoni as digitalisation partner

**Integration Approach:**
Tugende uses Musoni as a platform, integrating with their own third-party solutions to efficiently provide credit to motorcycle taxis and other SMEs in Uganda & Kenya.

**Strategic Note:**
Tugende represents asset finance sector (not traditional MFI), showing Musoni's flexibility for different financial service models.

---

## DOCUMENT 3: MICROLOAN FOUNDATION (MALAWI, ZAMBIA, ZIMBABWE)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/case_studies/microloan-foundation/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Southern Africa
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

MicroLoan Foundation (MLF) is a UK-based microfinance charity operating in Malawi, Zambia and Zimbabwe.

**Scale:**
- 92,000+ end customers across three countries
- 5+ years using Musoni
- 100% female clients
- Focus on rural areas

**Implementation Timeline:**
- 2015: Selected Musoni as long-term digitalisation partner
- 2015: Went live in Malawi and Zambia
- 2017: Launched in Zimbabwe

**Results Since Switching to Musoni:**
- Significant growth in client numbers
- Loan portfolio growth
- Total savings balances increased
- Maintained low PAR (Portfolio at Risk)
- Growth from 44,000 to 93,900 active clients

**Social Impact:**
- 85% of members earn below $2.50 per day
- 52% earn below $1.25 per day
- Uses PPI Surveys (integrated in Musoni)

**Customer Quote:**
"Musoni system has enabled VIRL to reach out to the unbanked population in rural Zimbabwe with loans that are transforming lives in rural communities and therefore reducing urban migration. Musoni system is flexible and easy to use."

---

## DOCUMENT 4: PROXIMITY FINANCE (MYANMAR)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/case_studies/proximity-finance/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Asia
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Proximity Finance is one of the largest MFIs in Myanmar.

**Scale:**
- 230,000+ end customers
- Portfolio over $50 million
- Part of Proximity Designs (largest agricultural services platform in Myanmar)
- Provides farm technology, advice and financial services to small family farms

**Implementation:**
- Chose Musoni as core banking and digitalisation partner
- Went live March 2020 (during COVID-19 lockdown)
- Launched Digital Field Application 4 months after going live
- DFA now used by 400+ field officers

**Results:**
During COVID lockdown (9 months post-launch):
- Client numbers increased by 80,000
- Loan portfolio grew by 40%
- All teams worked from home
- Full lockdown in Myanmar

**Strategic Significance:**
Successfully implemented major system during pandemic, demonstrating platform's cloud capabilities and remote work support.

---

## DOCUMENT 5: HAYMAN CAPITAL / HAYMAN MICROFINANCE (MYANMAR)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/case_studies/hayman-microfinance/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Asia
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

**About Hayman:**
- Microfinance institution in Myanmar
- Subsidiary of Hayman Capital Pte (Singapore-based)
- Founded June 2015
- Goal: Reduce poverty and improve livelihoods of vulnerable groups

**Musoni Relationship:**
- Incorporated November 2014
- Received operating license April 2015
- Selected Musoni as core banking partner
- First organisation to use Musoni in South East Asia (July 2015)
- Musoni's first MFI in Asia

**Growth:**
- Doubled client numbers and portfolio size every year since launch
- Currently serves 150,000+ end customers
- One of largest MFIs in Myanmar
- 2020: Recognized as fastest growing MFI in Myanmar (Global Banking & Finance Awards)

**Social Impact:**
- Over 78% of customers are women
- More than 70% working in rural areas
- Focus on micro-entrepreneurs and smallholder farmers

**Innovation:**
Hayman Microfinance launched client mobile banking app built on Musoni APIs.

---

## DOCUMENT 6: NEEMA HEEP (KENYA)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/neema-heep-musonis-longest-standing-partner/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Kenya
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Neema HEEP (Health, Education & Empowerment Program) is Musoni's longest-standing partner.

**About Neema HEEP:**
- Kenyan NGO started October 2010
- Goal: Reduce poverty and empower low-income Kenyans
- Located in Mt Kenya region
- Presence in Embu, Meru, Tharaka Nithi, Kirinyaga, Murang'a and Machakos Counties

**Musoni Relationship:**
- Started using Musoni System: July 2013
- 10+ years as customer
- Musoni's first customer

**Scale:**
- 3,800+ clients
- 56% rural outreach

**Digital Transformation:**
- Integrated with M-PESA through Musoni's Open APIs
- Enables secure cashless transactions
- Notable percentage of monthly repayments via M-PESA

**Strategic Significance:**
As Musoni's first customer, Neema HEEP represents proof of long-term customer satisfaction and platform stability over 10+ years.

---

## DOCUMENT 7: GBS MFI (GOOD BROTHERS)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/case_studies/good-brothers-and-musoni-system-impact/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Good Brothers MFI (GBS) underwent massive transformation partnering with Musoni.

**Initial State:**
- July 2021: Adopted Musoni System
- Portfolio: 13K clients, 33K loans

**Results:**
"In just a short span of 12 months, GBS MFI has undergone massive transformation. Partnering with Musoni System has completely reenergized our operations and made it more efficient."

**Next Steps:**
- Launching Digital Field Application (DFA) for field officers
- Digital transformation will help GBS MFI go paperless
- Expected improvements in data quality and efficiency

**Customer Quote:**
"Partnering with Musoni System has completely reenergized our operations and made it more efficient. Their core banking system has catapulted digital transformation in GBS."

---

## DOCUMENT 8: HEKIMA MFI (DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF CONGO)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/hekima-launch-musoni/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Francophone Africa
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Hekima is the largest and most efficient MFI in Kivu, eastern DRC.

**Decision:**
Recently chose to grow their business with the Musoni cloud banking system.

**Geographic Significance:**
- DRC is francophone Africa's largest market
- Kinshasa is world's largest Francophone city (11+ million)
- Represents Musoni's entry into Francophone Central Africa

**Strategic Note:**
Limited public case study details, suggesting newer customer relationship or confidentiality.

---

## DOCUMENT 9: MUSONI MICROFINANCE KENYA

SOURCE_URL: https://marcopolis.net/barbara-asumadu-presents-musoni-microfinance-the-leading-credit-only-microfinance-institution-in-kenya.htm
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Kenya (Related Entity)
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Musoni Microfinance Ltd is Kenya-based MFI established in 2010 (separate from Musoni System software company).

**Scale:**
- 80,000+ customers across Kenya
- 37 branches across Kenya
- 348 total employees

**Model:**
- Completely cashless microfinance institution
- Pioneer in digital lending space
- 100% mobile/cashless operations
- First financial institution in Kenya to employ mobile technology in lending

**History:**
- Founded 2009
- May 2010: Disbursed first loan
- Within 5 years: 128,000+ loans dispensed, 50,000+ active clients

**Technology:**
- Always used Musoni core banking system
- Mobile money integration
- SMS module
- Digital field application
- Uses M-PESA for all transactions

**Shareholders:**
- Musoni Netherlands (technology service provider)
- Grameen Foundation
- KFW Bank
- MicroVest Capital Funds

**Market Position:**
Described as "the leading credit-only microfinance institution in Kenya"

**Note:** This is the operational MFI that inspired the software product, showing the founders' first-hand experience.

---

## DOCUMENT 10: COREACS (PHILIPPINES)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/coreaccs/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Asia
CERTAINTY: Medium

### CONTENT:

CoReACS adopted Musoni to offer housing finance in the Philippines.

**Scale (as of October 2017):**
- 200 active solidarity groups
- 1,052 members
- 7 field staff
- 2 management members
- 4 offices

**Model:**
Uses solidarity group methodology enabled by Musoni's cloud technology.

**Strategic Significance:**
Demonstrates Musoni's penetration into Southeast Asia beyond Myanmar.

---

## DOCUMENT 11: MIFIDA (MYANMAR)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/gojo-mifida-musoni/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Asia
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Gojo & Company selected Musoni for MIFIDA in Myanmar.

**About MIFIDA:**
- Microfinance Delta International Company Limited
- Majority owned by Gojo & Company, Inc. (Japan)
- Gojo funded by JICA (Japan International Cooperation Agency)
- Under Japanese Ministry of Foreign Affairs

**Scale:**
- 180,000 clients in Myanmar

**Strategic Significance:**
- Japanese institutional backing
- Government-linked funding
- Demonstrates Musoni's credibility with major international development organizations

---

## DOCUMENT 12: ASG BANCORP (MYANMAR)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/asgb/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Asia
CERTAINTY: Medium

### CONTENT:

ASG Bancorp Microfinance Limited (ASGB) selected Musoni to accelerate digital roll out.

**About ASGB:**
- Part of The Asia Sustainability Group
- Focus on Myanmar market
- Selected Musoni as core banking and digitalisation partner

**Strategic Significance:**
Adds to Musoni's dominant position in Myanmar (14 organizations).

---

## DOCUMENT 13: BC FINANCE (MYANMAR)

SOURCE_URL: https://www.thitsaworks.com/post/bc-finance-goes-live-on-musoni-s-core-banking-system-as-its-digital-transformation-in-myanmar
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Asia
CERTAINTY: Medium

### CONTENT:

BC Finance Limited (BCF), one of Myanmar's leading microfinance institutions, has gone live with the Musoni core banking system.

**Implementation Support:**
ThitsaWorks (Musoni's support partner in Myanmar) closely supported implementation.

**Strategic Significance:**
Further strengthens Musoni's position as leading microfinance solutions provider in Myanmar (14 organizations).

---

## DOCUMENT 14: ZIMBABWE ASSOCIATION OF MICROFINANCE INSTITUTIONS (ZAMFI)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/musonizamfipartnership/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Zimbabwe
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

ZAMFI (Zimbabwe Association of Microfinance Institutions) selected Musoni as preferred microfinance software for organisations in Zimbabwe.

**Timeline:**
- 6 MFIs already using system at time of partnership
- Over next 12 months: Musoni System to be rolled out to multiple organisations

**Selection Criteria:**
- Quality of operational reports
- User-friendliness of workflows & interface
- Company's experience integrating new technology

**Customer Quote (VIRL):**
"Musoni system has enabled VIRL to reach out to the unbanked population in rural Zimbabwe with loans that are transforming lives in rural communities and therefore reducing urban migration."

**Strategic Significance:**
Industry association endorsement provides strong credibility and market access in Zimbabwe.

---

## DOCUMENT 15: ZIBUKO CAPITAL (ZIMBABWE)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/zibukocapital/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Zimbabwe
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Zibuko Capital won "Most Digitised MFI Award in Zimbabwe."

**Digital Transformation:**
Built Zibuko Mobile app (client-facing app) on Musoni's open APIs.

**CEO Quote:**
"Musoni System provided us with an opportunity to leverage across various digital platforms and continue serving our clients virtually during the Covid-19 lockdown. They helped us build up our Zibuko Mobile app, a client-facing app which helped clients apply for loans and check the status of their accounts without the need to visit a branch."

**Strategic Significance:**
Award-winning implementation demonstrates Musoni's capability to enable digital transformation and support customers through crisis.

---

## DOCUMENT 16: SYPO (CUSTOMER TESTIMONIAL)

SOURCE_URL: https://www.capterra.com/p/231593/Musoni/reviews/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence - Testimonial
CERTAINTY: Medium

### CONTENT:

"Musoni is a great, solid and fit-for-purpose system with a knowledgeable and responsive team. SYPO has been able to serve thousands of clients faster and through innovative (eg, mobile money) products because of the functionality and flexibility provided by Musoni."

**Customer Profile:**
SYPO using Musoni to serve thousands of clients with mobile money integration.

---

### CONTENT:

Bicycles Against Poverty operates in Uganda distributing bicycles.
